course_title: Human Resource Mgmt In Health Care
course_description: Prerequisites: HPM 501 and HPM 502 or permission of the instructor. Provides an overview of interpersonal dynamics, conflict resolution, and human resource management in health care organizations
prerequisites: This class is for HPMMPH or HPMMSPH students only.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3214, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 3-4:50p, Instructor: Team, Status: Closed
